name: Inside the Memories
description:
Inside the Memories is a re imagination of the classic game "Find a Pair", in which you where you have to find a pair of identical cards on a set of cards disposed on the table.

Travelling through your memories, you will have to find the pairs on time to go forward and recover your memories. But it's not going to be easy, as there are many trap cards hidden on the table.

Train your reaction and visual memory, and recover all your memories in time!
